verses.verse: Now the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> had<WH1961> an exceedingly<WH3966> large<WH6099> number<WH6099> of livestock.<WH4735> So when they saw<WH7200> the land<WH776> of Jazer<WH3270> and the land<WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> that it was indeed<WH2009> a place<WH4725> suitable<WH4725> for livestock,<WH4735>

the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> came<WH935> and spoke<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and to Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> and to the leaders<WH5387> of the congregation,<WH5712> saying,<WH559>
"Ataroth,<WH5852> Dibon,<WH1769> Jazer,<WH3270> Nimrah,<WH5247> Heshbon,<WH2809> Elealeh,<WH500> Sebam,<WH7643> Nebo<WH5015> and Beon,<WH1194>

the land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> conquered<WH5221> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> is a land<WH776> for livestock;<WH4735> and your servants<WH5650> have livestock.<WH4735> "

And they said,<WH559> "If<WH518> we have found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in your sight,<WH5869> let this<WH2088> land<WH776> be given<WH5414> to your servants<WH5650> as a possession;<WH272> do not take<WH5674> us across<WH5674> the Jordan.<WH3383>"

But Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and to the sons<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> "Shall your brothers<WH251> go<WH935> to war<WH4421> while you yourselves<WH9043> sit<WH3427> here<WH6311>?
"Now why<WH4100> are you discouraging<WH5106> <WH3820> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from crossing<WH5674> over<WH5674> into the land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> has given<WH5414> them?
"This<WH3541> is what<WH3541> your fathers did<WH1> when I sent<WH6213> them from Kadesh-barnea to see<WH7971> the land.<WH7200>

"For when they went<WH5927> up to the valley<WH5158> of Eshcol<WH812> and saw<WH7200> the land,<WH776> they discouraged<WH5106> <WH3820> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> so that they did not go<WH935> into the land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had given<WH5414> them.
"So the Lord's anger<WH639> burned<WH2734> in that day,<WH3117> and He swore,<WH7650> saying,<WH559>

'None<WH518> of the men<WH376> who came<WH5927> up from Egypt,<WH4714> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> shall see<WH7200> the land<WH127> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> to Abraham,<WH85> to Isaac<WH3327> and to Jacob;<WH3290> for they did not follow<WH310> Me fully,<WH4390>

except<WH1115> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenizzite<WH7074> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> for they have followed<WH310> the Lord<WH3068> fully.<WH4390>'

"So the Lord<WH3068>'s anger<WH639> burned<WH2734> against Israel,<WH3478> and He made them wander<WH5128> in the wilderness<WH4057> forty<WH705> years,<WH8141> until<WH5704> the entire<WH3605> generation of those who had done<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord was destroyed.<WH8552>

"Now behold,<WH2009> you have risen<WH6965> up in your fathers' place,<WH8478> a brood<WH8635> of sinful<WH2400> men,<WH376> to add<WH5595> still<WH5750> more<WH5750> to the burning<WH2740> anger<WH639> of the Lord<WH3068> against<WH413> Israel.<WH3478>

"For if you turn<WH7725> away<WH7725> from following<WH310> Him, He will once<WH3254> <WH5750> more<WH3254> <WH5750> abandon<WH5117> them in the wilderness;<WH4057> and you will destroy<WH7843> all<WH3605> these<WH2088> people.<WH5971>"

Then they came<WH5066> near<WH5066> to him and said,<WH559> "We will build<WH1129> here<WH6311> sheepfolds<WH6629> <WH1448> for our livestock<WH4735> and cities<WH5892> for our little<WH2945> ones;<WH2945>

but we ourselves<WH587> will be armed<WH9139> ready<WH2363> [to go] before<WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> until<WH5704> <WH834> <WH518> we have brought<WH935> them to their place,<WH4725> while our little<WH2945> ones<WH2945> live<WH3427> in the fortified<WH4013> cities<WH5892> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land.<WH776>
"We will not return<WH7725> to our homes<WH1004> until<WH5704> every<WH376> one<WH376> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> has possessed<WH5157> his inheritance.<WH5159>

"For we will not have<WH5157> an inheritance<WH5157> with them on the other<WH5676> side<WH5676> of the Jordan<WH3383> and beyond,<WH1973> because<WH3588> our inheritance<WH5159> has fallen<WH935> to us on this side<WH5676> of the Jordan<WH3383> toward the east.<WH4217>"
So Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, "If<WH518> you will do<WH6213> this,<WH2088> if<WH518> you will arm<WH9139> yourselves before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> for the war,<WH4421>

and all<WH3605> of you armed<WH9139> men cross<WH5674> over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> until<WH5704> He has driven<WH3423> His enemies<WH340> out from before<WH6440> Him,

and the land<WH776> is subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> then afterward<WH310> you shall return<WH7725> and be free<WH9345> of obligation<WH9345> toward<WH4480> the Lord<WH3068> and toward<WH4480> Israel,<WH3478> and this<WH2088> land<WH776> shall be yours for a possession<WH272> before<WH6440> the Lord.<WH3068>
"But if<WH518> you will not do<WH6213> so,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> you have sinned<WH2398> against the Lord,<WH3068> and be sure<WH3045> your sin<WH9128> will find<WH4672> you out.
"Build<WH1129> yourselves cities<WH5892> for your little<WH2945> ones,<WH2945> and sheepfolds<WH1448> for your sheep;<WH6792> and do<WH6213> what you have promised<WH3318>.<WH4480> <WH6310>"

And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> "Your servants<WH5650> will do<WH6213> just<WH9201> as my lord<WH113> commands.<WH6680>
"Our little<WH2945> ones,<WH2945> our wives,<WH802> our livestock<WH4735> and all<WH3605> our cattle<WH929> shall remain<WH1961> there<WH8033> in the cities<WH5892> of Gilead;<WH1568>

while your servants,<WH5650> everyone<WH3605> who is armed<WH9139> for war,<WH6635> will cross<WH5674> over<WH5674> in the presence<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068> to battle,<WH4421> just<WH9201> as my lord<WH113> says.<WH1696> "

So Moses<WH4872> gave<WH6680> command<WH6680> concerning them to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and to the heads<WH7218> of the fathers' [households] of the tribes<WH4294> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, "If<WH518> the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> everyone<WH3605> who is armed<WH9139> for battle,<WH4421> will cross<WH5674> with you over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> in the presence<WH6440> of the Lord,<WH3068> and the land<WH776> will be subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> you, then you shall give<WH5414> them the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> for a possession;<WH272>
but if<WH518> they will not cross<WH5674> over<WH5674> with you armed,<WH9139> they shall have<WH270> possessions<WH270> among<WH8432> you in the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667> "

And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> answered,<WH6030> saying,<WH559> "As the Lord<WH3068> has said<WH1696> to your servants,<WH5650> so<WH3651> we will do.<WH6213>

"We ourselves<WH5168> will cross<WH5674> over<WH5674> armed<WH9139> in the presence<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068> into the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> and the possession<WH272> of our inheritance<WH5159> [shall remain] with us across<WH4480> <WH5676> the Jordan.<WH3383>"

So Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> to them, to the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and to the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and to the half-tribe of Joseph's son<WH1121> Manasseh,<WH4519> the kingdom<WH4467> of Sihon,<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567> and the kingdom<WH4467> of Og,<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> the land<WH776> with its cities<WH5892> with [their] territories,<WH1367> the cities<WH5892> of the surrounding<WH5439> land.<WH776>
And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> built<WH1129> Dibon<WH1769> and Ataroth<WH5852> and Aroer,<WH6177>
and Atroth-shophan and Jazer<WH3270> and Jogbehah,<WH3011>
and Beth-nimrah and Beth-haran as fortified<WH4013> cities,<WH5892> and sheepfolds<WH1448> for sheep.<WH6629>
And the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> built<WH1129> Heshbon<WH2809> and Elealeh<WH500> and Kiriathaim,<WH7156>
and Nebo<WH5015> and Baal-meon – [their] names<WH8034> being changed<WH5437> – and Sibmah,<WH7643> and they gave<WH7121> [other] names<WH8034> to the cities<WH5892> which<WH834> they built.<WH1129>
And the sons<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH1980> to Gilead<WH1568> and took<WH3920> it, and dispossessed<WH3423> the Amorites<WH567> who<WH834> were in it.
So Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> Gilead<WH1568> to Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> and he lived<WH3427> in it.
And Jair<WH2971> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> its towns,<WH2333> and called<WH7121> them Havvoth-jair.
And Nobah<WH5025> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> Kenath<WH7079> and its villages,<WH1323> and called<WH7121> it Nobah<WH5025> after his own name.<WH8034>
